# title

**Instance Property**

The localized string to use as the title of the action.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String { get }
```

## Discussion

The system displays this string as the title of the button that the user taps or selects in the notification interface.

## Getting Information

- **identifier**: The unique string that your app uses to identify the action.
- **icon**: The icon associated with the action.
